column5: Our Del Valle home is just 1.5 miles from the Circuit of the Americas Race Track. In fact, you can see it from our Cul de Sac. We have a very quiet street and Cul de Sac. Room for 4 cars to park in the driveway and another couple on the curb.
column8: F1, ACL, SXSW, Austin360 Amphitheater, Austin 3/2
